Subject: Unicron's Warriors(Maximals)
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=156647449
X-Yahoo-Profile: bustercross365

Deep inside Unicron, two robotic forms stir from their rest, and 
awake.  One was tall, with beam weapons mounted into his body.  His 
face was always a perpetual sneer, which cleverly disguised his lack 
of thinking. The other, also tall, was much differant.  He was like a 
dignitary or stately male.  But his regal appearance hide his 
incredible indurance, he survived many battles, and thus his 
judgement was affected.  He regarded his companion with disgust, he 
was inferior.  Suddenly a fmale voice rang out.
"Splattercannon, Necross, you are to proceed to the Maximal base on 
the planet.  Unicron's orders."
The female chuckled from an unseen corridor, as the first male walke 
to an airlock.
"Hold it, you oaf, we need provisions, we need energon!" Necross said.
"Well then let's get some and go!  Unicron commands!" Splattercannon 
says as he turns an walks down another corridor.  They shortly come 
upon an energon cache, consume their fill, and then leave for the 
planet below, intent on fighting this day.
